H0.text: Which footballer scored a record six international hat- tricks for England. Bobby Charlton

H1.text: Which footballer scored a record six international hat- tricks for England. Michael Owen

H2.text: Which footballer scored a record six international hat- tricks for England. Alan Shearer

H3.text: Which footballer scored a record six international hat- tricks for England. Greavsie

A4.text: In 1959, Charlton scored a hat-trick as England demolished the US 8–1

A5.text: his second England hat-trick came in 1961 in an 8–0 thrashing of Mexico

A6.text: In May 2005, he scored his second international hat-trick in a friendly match against Colombia at Giants Stadium.

A7.text: Owen was the first player to have scored in four consecutive major tournaments for England.

A8.text: Greaves holds the record for most hat-tricks for England – six in all.
